segments.text: This scene is making me quite nervous, especially with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, his body elongated towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool's legs are splayed out, almost like it's doing a split.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, tilted backward, just waiting to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One false move and he's going to come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s holding a plate, either to catch the cookies or maybe to use as a lid, I can't quite tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems completely oblivious to the danger, just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a risky maneuver for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really should supervise them better.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't get hurt or break those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is quite high.
segments.speaker: PAR
